snippet: The man, 70, appeared at State Supreme Court and was arraigned on two counts of sexual abuse.
abstract: Ilya Lehman, 70-year-old owner of several private music schools for young children in Manhattan, is charged with sexually molesting 9-year-old girl during lessons over course of nearly two years.
lead_paragraph: The man, 70, appeared at State Supreme Court and was arraigned on two counts of sexual abuse.

headline.main: Owner of Music Schools Charged With Molesting 9-Year-Old
headline.print_headline: Music Teacher Charged With Molesting Pupil
